alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 06 at 12:24PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gulf, southeastern Bay and southern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, Liberty and north central Franklin Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 130 PM EDT/1230 PM CDT/... At 1224 PM EDT/1124 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 20 miles north of Carrabelle to near Mexico Beach. Movement was northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Callaway, Springfield, Mexico Beach, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Orange, Parker, Wewahitchka, Bristol, East Camp, Honeyville, Allanton, Vilas, Chipola Cutoff, Jensen Place, Central City, Red Hill, Clio, Overstreet and Scotts Ferry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Franklin; Inland Gulf; Liberty
